amendment.description: To designate a rest area on the Mount Vernon Trail as the "Peter B. Webster III Memorial Area".

vote.text: Amendment SA 3661 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3661 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Coons to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5502) To designate a rest area on the Mount Vernon Trail as the "Peter B. Webster III Memorial Area".
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3661 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Coons to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3661 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
